授業方法: The course will focus on “Experience” through the discussion/homework more than lecture. Therefore, all lectures will be conducted in Face to Face. and physical presence will be strongly recommended.  Hybrid participation could be available for Lecture 1,2, 3, 4, 9, 10, but not for the others (no recording as well), since those lectures involves team’s intensive discussion. The test must be taken in the classroom(Lecture 13), so if you do not come to class your score will be “0”  PC, Digital device use in the class is limited to “Course Material View”, “Note taking”, and some which the lecture permit.  Non class related e.g. “Line” chat etc. is strictly prohibited in the class and if it is noticed that you use it, your attendance will be recorded as “Absence” and affect your evaluation in “Class Contribution”. For “Hybrid participation”, you must turn on “Video” to show your face.
